schema.name: project name/title
schema.last-commit: if build avalable: date of last commit on master. else: leave blank
schema.progress: stage of project. plan(light orange)=planning stage -> dev(blue)=in development -> prod(green)=build available -> dep(red)=not maintained

demo.tab: boolean value if demo is deployed separate
